name: Christmas
description: Christmas is a joyous holiday celebrated on December 25th each year, where Christians commemorate the birth of Jesus Christ with traditions including gift-giving, festive decorations, and gatherings with loved ones.

name: Halloween
description: Halloween is an autumnal celebration on October 31st marked by costumes, spooky decorations, and trick-or-treating, rooted in ancient Celtic and Christian traditions.

name: Independence Day (US)
description: Independence Day, celebrated on July 4th in the United States, commemorates the country's declaration of independence from British rule in 1776 with fireworks, parades, and patriotic festivities.
